item.description:
Indoor rock climbing is challenging but there is no greater thrill then the first time you climb to the top.  We organized this for Sun 12/30 and while we had quite a few drop outs, the people that did show had a great time and want to go again... so here it is... next Sunday morning...

The facility is friendly, they have lessons to get you started – and it isn’t expensive – a day pass is $18 and a full equipment rental is $10.  The first session is $40 all-in and includes an instructional course on handling the rope, knot tying, etc.

ATTENDEES: Once you sign up here call Metro Rock at 617–387–ROCK (7625) and schedule yourself for the Sunday morning class.  Tell them you are part of a meetup group and mention my name and that I am a member.  They will take a credit card to secure a spot.

You are certain to leave with a great feeling and tired forearms.  Get the Jello out of those legs snd start climbing the wall...

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Climbing the walls at Metro Rock indoor rock climbing
